### **Working directory set up**
 *The wizard will guide you through the process to set up working directories for the Gap analysis.*
 ***
1. Write the Crop name in the Crop name field.
2. Click the button **"choose Dir"** and search the destination folder in which the directory structure will be created.
3. Finally, click on **"Create dirs button"**, this will create all necessary folder to store inputs, results, etc...
